Send in those registration cards!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 4 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here) : Send in those registration cards!
By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, November 18, 2003 - 01:02 pm:

Just a reminder that Tecmo occasionally sends out freebies to people on the mailing list. Also, it's pretty important for them to know the demographics of their customers. (that age blank is important, if you want future MR games to be less 'kiddie')

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, November 18, 2003 - 05:40 pm:

The Cell Phone question on the card may influence whether or not we get those MR cell phone games they have in Japan....

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, January 13, 2004 - 10:40 am:

Um, I think the electronic sorting machines at the post office are incapabale of stalking, and the average postal carrier has too much work to do, to be bothered to write down info off one of the hundreds of post cards he delivers daily.

The MR2 card will get you on the mailing list.

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, August 25, 2004 - 11:22 am:

Yes. And, it's never too late to send them in. Tecmo keeps adding people to their mailing lists all the time. For the last few years they have sent out special holiday greeting cards, as well as some demo discs and informational flyers.
